main.name: Katherine Leung
main.description: I am a student the University of Central Florida. I am curious about how things work and why they work a certain way. I love designing for functionality
main.bio: I was born in Maracaibo, Venezuela and moved to Florida with my family 9 years ago. Even though, I grew up in warm weather. I prefer cold weather, just not too cold. Like NY during fall cold. I am recent graduate from the University of Central Florida. I love cooking and exploring new cuisines. I enjoy finding new trails to take my dog on long walks. I also love traveling, exploring new places and culture. I took the picture above when I did my first solo trip to NYC!
main.contactmessage: Send me a message and I will get back to you as soon as possible!

resume.skillmessage: Stuff that I kind of know. Sort of like a jack of all trades but a master of none.

education.description: Bachelor of Arts in Digital Media (Web Design and Social Platforms Track)

work.title: Brand Representative
work.description: Provided customer service, prioritized customer requests and recommended products to customers. Maintained sales floor presentation and upheld the company's brand. Shelve and organized merchandise as needed. Worked along with co-workers to meet daily sales goal

work.title: Information Desk Volunteer
work.description: Provided information to callers while following HIPAA regulations and directed callers to the proper location, department, or doctor's office. Receive, greet, and guide visitors to the right location. Assisted visitors, family and patients around the hospital walking or by wheelchair

projects.title: Flower Channel
projects.category: Flower Channel assignment for Client-Side class
